lines.text: When you're good and smart and kind of heart, there's nothing you can't win. And it never hurts to remember a name like...
Stop it, stop it, stop it, I say. If you don't stop this crying, I'll just go away!
I am an elf, and I live in this wood. I play nasty tricks, some evil, some good.
I promise to protect you from any injustices in the future.
